ddl.statement: CREATE TABLE tzot (order_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, amount DECIMAL)
CREATE TABLE aljk (id INT PRIMARY KEY, aljk_name VARCHAR(100))
CREATE TABLE aqsa (id INT PRIMARY KEY, aqsa_name VARCHAR(100))

queries.query: SELECT u.id, u.name, COUNT(o.order_id) FROM aqsa u JOIN aljk o ON u.id = o.user_id GROUP BY u.id
SELECT u.id, u.name, COUNT(o.order_id) FROM aqsa u JOIN tzot o ON u.id = o.user_id GROUP BY u.id
WITH active_tzot AS (SELECT id FROM tzot WHERE active = true) SELECT * FROM aljk WHERE user_id IN (SELECT id FROM active_tzot)
WITH active_aljk AS (SELECT id FROM aljk WHERE active = true) SELECT * FROM aqsa WHERE user_id IN (SELECT id FROM active_aljk)
WITH active_aljk AS (SELECT id FROM aljk WHERE active = true) SELECT * FROM aqsa WHERE user_id IN (SELECT id FROM active_aljk)
SELECT u.id, u.name, COUNT(o.order_id) FROM aljk u JOIN aqsa o ON u.id = o.user_id GROUP BY u.id
SELECT u.id, u.name, COUNT(o.order_id) FROM aljk u JOIN tzot o ON u.id = o.user_id GROUP BY u.id
WITH active_aljk AS (SELECT id FROM aljk WHERE active = true) SELECT * FROM tzot WHERE user_id IN (SELECT id FROM active_aljk)
